nodes.name: transfer
transferFrom
approve
increaseAllowance

devdoc.details: ERC20Pausable adds the ability to pause ERC20 compliant template      used by the ERC20Template contract for pausing the contract.

approve(address,uint256).details: approve     Standard ERC20 approve function with onlyNotPaused modifier.     Can be called only if the contract is not paused.

params.spender: refers to an address that is allowed to spend tokens.
params.value: refers to amount of tokens that could be spent.

approve(address,uint256).return: true if approval is success, false otherwise.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: decreaseAllowance     Standard ERC20 decreaseAllowance function with onlyNotPaused modifier.     Can be called only if the contract is not paused.

params.spender: refers to an address that is allowed to spend tokens.
params.subtractedValue: refers to an subtracted amount of tokens that could be spent.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).return: true if allowance is decreased successfully, false otherwise.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: increaseAllowance     Standard ERC20 increaseAllowance function with onlyNotPaused modifier.     Can be called only if the contract is not paused.

params.addedValue: refers to an added amount of tokens that could be spent.
params.spender: refers to an address that is allowed to spend tokens.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).return: true if allowance is increased successfully, false otherwise.

transfer(address,uint256).details: transfer     Standard ERC20 transfer function with onlyNotPaused modifier.     Can be called only if the contract is not paused.

params.to: refers to an address that tokens are tranfered to.
params.value: refers to amount of tokens being tranfered.

transfer(address,uint256).return: true if transfer is success, false otherwise.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: transfer     Standard ERC20 transferFrom function with onlyNotPaused modifier.     Can be called only if the contract is not paused.

params.from: refers to an address that tokens are tranfered from.
params.to: refers to an address that tokens are tranfered to.
params.value: refers to amount of tokens being tranfered.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: true if transfer is success, false otherwise.
